root.name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz
root.description: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz is a new title in the Super Monkey Ball series from Sega. It will utilize both touch screens as well as dual-stick controls. Popular mini-games like Monkey Target make a comeback alone with game modes which are being add for the Playstation Vita version.An extended CGI Trailer for the title was released on youTube on Jan 13th.
